observation.new_content:
#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

"""Script to reproduce the binary payload issue."""

import sys
import os

# Add the requests directory to the path so we can import it
sys.path.insert(0, '/tmp/tmpuhqdhen5/requests')

try:
    import requests
    print("Testing binary payload issue...")
    
    # This should fail in version 2.9 but work in 2.8.1
    data = u"ööö".encode("utf-8")
    print(f"Data type: {type(data)}")
    print(f"Data content: {data}")
    
    # Try to make the request
    response = requests.put("http://httpbin.org/put", data=data)
    print("Request succeeded!")
    print(f"Status code: {response.status_code}")
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f"Error occurred: {e}")
    print(f"Error type: {type(e)}")
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()
